name: archer scrap yarn bag
notes:
the archer scrap yarn bag is a fun, quick and beautiful messenger bag / fanny pack with i-cord sides and adjustable sizes for both bag and shoulder strap!
**this is the knitted version of this bag! a crochet version is also available for free!**
you can choose to knit it using scrap yarns and destashing your hoard *(i see you, yarn goblin!)*

this pattern is perfect for first-time knitters as it's worked flat, has easy construction, is gender-neutral, comes with written instructions as well as photos, and can be adjusted to your needs!

worked in scrap yarns, and preferrably using more strands held together, this bag can also be a wonderfully quick project!

it comes with a captioned video tutorial on yt!

**overview:**
language - english & italian
level - beginner 
techniques used -  k, m1r, m1l, k2tog, ssk

there is **not** the need to **check gauge** or swatch for this pattern. you'll measure it following the instructions.

**materials required:**
yarn: worsted or scrap yarns held together
approximately: 120-200gr of yarn 
depending on how big you want your bag, and how long you want your shoulder straps, more yarn might be needed.

**tools required:**
5mm / 6mm knitting needles
stitch markers
tapestry needle
scissors
